title: Toyota Hilux is (Mostly) New, But Still a Big Deal Worldwide
description: While the Ford F-Series remains the world's best-selling pickup because North American customers can't stop buying them, the Toyota Hilux is still the go-to truck for the rest of the world. Indeed, the Hilux has been synonymous with durability, longevity, and reliability for nearly 60 years, ...
titleSummary: "Global Sales Powerhouse Gets Revamp: Meet the Latest Toyota Hilux"
descriptionSummary: The Ford F-Series dominates the North American market, but globally, the Toyota Hilux reigns supreme as a trusted workhorse, built on a reputation for ruggedness, endurance, and unwavering dependability that's stood the test of time since the 1960s.

title: Toyota May Pay You for Your Car's Driving Data — But Only If It's Useful
description: Toyota has filed a patent for a system that would pay vehicle owners in exchange for their driving data. This is how it would work: your car collects information about your trips, sends it to Toyota's servers, and their system evaluates whether that data is useful. If it passes certain checks and ...
titleSummary: Toyota to Reward Drivers with Cash for Sharing Valuable Insights on Their Habits
descriptionSummary: Toyota has applied for a patent on a program that rewards drivers with compensation in exchange for sharing trip-related data from their vehicles, which would be analyzed by the company's system to determine its value.

title: Own a 2022 Chevy Malibu? GM Will Replace the Turbo for Free
description: General Motors has issued a special coverage bulletin claiming that certain units of the 2022 Chevy Malibu may face issues leading to malfunctioning turbochargers. Affected cars may throw a check engine light and warning message on the dashboard, and may also enter a low power limp mode. GM, in an ...
titleSummary: "Turbo Troubles Solved: Chevrolet to Replace Faulty Units in 2022 Malibus at No Charge"
descriptionSummary: General Motors has issued a safety notice indicating that some 2022 Chevy Malibus may experience turbocharger malfunctions, which can cause a check engine light to appear along with a dashboard warning, potentially limiting vehicle performance.

title: Surprise: The C8 Corvette and Mustang GTD Might Share the Same Manual Gearbox
description: Tremec has cracked the issue that General Motors said was too expensive and too niche to solve. The transmission specialist unveiled a new six-speed manual at SEMA 2025 that bolts directly to the C8 Corvette using the same mounting points as its factory 8-speed dual-clutch transmission. Even ...
titleSummary: "Corvettes and Stangs May Swap Gears with a Common Transmission Twist"
descriptionSummary: Tremec has finally addressed the challenge GM deemed too costly and specialized to overcome, unveiling a sleek six-speed manual for the C8 Corvette at SEMA 2025. Its innovative design enables direct bolt-on installation, mirroring the stock 8-speed dual-clutch transmission's mounting points.

title: Porsche’s New Cayenne EV Uses the Same Tech That Won Formula E
description: Porsche had a phenomenal 2024–2025 Formula E season, which ended with the Stuttgart brand clinching both the Teams’ and Manufacturers’ championships. As with other automakers, motorsport remains a proving ground for technologies that later appear in road cars. It’s no surprise, then, that the ...
titleSummary: "Electric SUV Packs Formula E Proven Powertrain in Latest Porsche Innovation Leap"
descriptionSummary: Porsche dominated the 2024-25 Formula E season, securing both team and manufacturer titles. With motorsports serving as a testing ground for cutting-edge tech, it's little wonder that innovative concepts soon make their way onto production roads.

title: Irresistible 2026 Hyundai Tucson Lease Deals for November Arrive Just in Time for Thanksgiving
description: The 2026 Hyundai Tucson enters the scene with its confident, sculpted look and futuristic lighting signature that still turns heads in crowded commuter lanes. Hyundai sticks to what works here, keeping the bold styling while refining tech availability and interior usability. Inside, the Tucson ...
titleSummary: "Turkeys and Treats Abound: Hot 2026 Hyundai Tucson Leases Launch This November"
descriptionSummary: The latest Hyundai Tucson makes a striking impression with its sleek, modern design and innovative lighting cues that cut through urban traffic with ease. Its refreshed features prioritize both style and substance within.

title: Billionaires, Take Note: A Dark Magnesium McLaren F1 Just Hit the Market
description: There may be faster accelerating cars these days, but the McLaren F1 still holds a record that no one will likely ever beat. It's still the fastest naturally aspirated car in the world with a top speed of 240.1 mph. In a world of electrification and turbocharging, we don't see that number being ...
titleSummary: "Ultra-Rare McLaren F1 Fetches Big Bucks on the High-End Car Circuit"
descriptionSummary: The McLaren F1 remains an untouchable benchmark, boasting a remarkable top speed of 240.1 mph as the fastest naturally aspirated car on the planet. Its dominance in a era of electric and turbocharged powerhouses is unlikely to be surpassed anytime soon.

title: New Body Kit Turns the Suzuki Jimny Into a Mini Land Cruiser
description: If you ever thought the Suzuki Jimny lacked personality—which it doesn’t—there’s an alternative that might pique your interest. Japanese tuner Garage Ill (spelled "ill") has a body kit that gives the cute little Jimny a whole lot of visual character. Not that it needed it, but the tuner managed to ...
titleSummary: "Jimny Gets a Baja-Ready Makeover with this Show-Stopping Off-Road Conversion Kit"
descriptionSummary: For those who thought the Suzuki Jimny's charm was missing something, a unique solution comes from Japanese performance shop Garage ill. Their bespoke body kit injects the Jimny with bold new styling cues.

title: Unlike Ford, Honda Isn’t Rushing to Build a $30,000 EV
description: Finding a new electric car in America that costs under $30,000 is a short search – there are only two: the Nissan Leaf and the returning Chevrolet Bolt. Both hover above the $29,000 mark as a base. Everything else lives well above that range. Honda’s only full EV in the US market is the ...
titleSummary: "Honda Takes a Measured Approach to Affordable Electric Vehicles"
descriptionSummary: In the US electric vehicle market, options under $30,000 are scarce, with just two models available: the Nissan Leaf and the revived Chevrolet Bolt, both priced above the $29,000 base level.

title: Own a Piece of Tokyo Drift History With This VeilSide Mazda RX-7 Replica
description: Tokyo drift is and always will be a favorite among enthusiasts. Car nerds and movie buffs around the world were quite impressed when the third installment of the Fast and Furious franchise premiered back in 2006. Perhaps what we were more concerned about than the plot itself was Han’s death, his ...
titleSummary: "Shift into Iconic Style with Rare Mazda RX-7 Reproduction, a Tokyo Drift Dream Car"
descriptionSummary: Fans have long cherished Tokyo drift as an iconic favorite. The release of Fast Five in 2006 sparked excitement among car enthusiasts and movie lovers alike, with Han's shocking demise leaving a lasting impact on viewers worldwide.

title: Toyota's Making More Money Despite Tariffs Because Everyone Wants Hybrids
description: Tariffs went up. Paperwork started looking ugly for all importing brands. Yet Toyota just told investors it expects to make more money this year. That only happens when cars are leaving lots fast and the math still works. The signal is clear: hybrids are doing the heavy lifting, and buyers aren’t ...
titleSummary: "Hybrid Hype Drives Toyota Profit Despite Trade War Headwinds"
descriptionSummary: With tariffs on imported goods rising, many brands face paperwork headaches, but Toyota's optimistic forecast suggests its vehicles are moving swiftly off dealerships, driven by strong hybrid sales and savvy pricing that continues to pay off.

title: BMW Drops Hot 2026 X6 Lease Deal For November
description: It may be as subtle as a sledgehammer, but the unapologetically bold BMW X6 is still relevant today, close to 20 years after it helped popularize the coupe-SUV look—known to BMW aficionados as the sports activity coupe. In a J.D. Power study from earlier this year, the X6 ranked as the most ...
titleSummary: "BMW Unveils Limited-Time Offer on Sleek 2026 X6 Luxury SUV Leases This Month"
descriptionSummary: The BMW X6's unapologetic swagger has endured for nearly two decades, ever since its introduction pioneered the now-iconic sports utility coupe design. Recently, it topped a reliability survey, solidifying its position in the market.

title: You're Charging Your EV Wrong and It's Killing Performance
description: The road clears, you press the pedal, and the car snaps forward like a rubber band. That snap fades if you cook the pack or run it to fumes. The fix isn’t complicated or geeky. Live between 20% and 80% most days. It’s the happy zone where power stays punchy, regen feels natural, and the battery ...
titleSummary: "EV Owners' Common Mistake Slowing Down Cars, But Easy to Fix"
descriptionSummary: As you hit the gas, the car surges forward with a responsive burst of energy. But overexertion can dull this performance. For optimal results, aim to maintain a 20-80% charge range daily, where power is balanced and regenerative braking feels effortless.

title: Rare 2016 BMW M4 GTS for Sale With Just 10,000 Miles
description: A low-mileage 2016 BMW M4 GTS, showing just 10,900 miles, has surfaced for sale on Cars & Bids. This California-owned coupe is one of only 828 examples built worldwide and about 300 sent to the U.S., making it one of BMW M’s rarest and most focused road cars. Finished ...
titleSummary: Low-Mileage Superstar: 2016 BMW M4 GTS Hits the Market with Only 10k Miles Ticked
descriptionSummary: A highly sought-after 2016 BMW M4 GTS, boasting an exceptionally low 10,900 miles, has emerged on Cars & Bids for sale. This California-owned coupe is a rare gem, with just 828 produced worldwide and only around 300 exported to the US, making it one of the most exclusive road-going M cars ever built.

title: My Jaw Dropped Seeing Ken Okuyama's Kode 57 Up Close and Personal
description: Harajuku is unofficially known as Tokyo's center of fashion. Between Takeshita Street's beautiful chaos and the serene charm of Omotesando, it's the place where trends are mostly reinvented. But a few turns away from the crowded alleys and influencer cafes, I wandered into a quieter part of the ...
titleSummary: "Okuyama's Kode 57 Leaves Me Breathless in Unforgettable Up-Close Encounter"
descriptionSummary: Tucked between Tokyo's vibrant fashion hubs – Takeshita Street's eclectic energy and Omotesando's refined elegance – lies a lesser-known corner where trends unfold in unexpected ways.

title: Yamaha’s Forgotten Supercar – The Sports Coupe That Could’ve Changed Everything
description: When you think Yamaha, your mind probably jumps to two extremes: a superbike howling down a mountain pass or a grand piano commanding a concert hall. Cars, though? Not so much. However, in 2015, at the Tokyo Motor Show (now Japan Mobility Show), Yamaha surprised everyone with something straight out ...
titleSummary: "Yamaha's Elusive Dream Car: A High-Performance Beauty Lost to History"
descriptionSummary: Yamaha is often associated with high-performance motorcycles and premium pianos, but it's less well-known for its automotive endeavors. That changed in 2015 with a surprise unveiling at the Tokyo Motor Show: a sleek and innovative car concept that generated significant buzz.

title: The Dodge Charger V-8 Could Be Making a Comeback — Here’s What We Know So Far
description: For the past year, Dodge has been on a mission to sell enthusiasts on its electric future. The Charger Daytona EV was supposed to usher in a new muscle car era—loud, fast, and battery-powered. But it hasn’t exactly caught fire with traditionalists. Now, it sounds like Dodge might be listening. The ...
titleSummary: "Rumors Swirl of Revived Dodge Charger V8: Inside the Potential Return"
descriptionSummary: Dodge has been vying for the attention of enthusiasts with its electric ambitions over the past year. Its high-profile Charger Daytona EV was touted as a game-changer – a loud, fast muscle car reimagined for the modern era. However, it hasn't quite sparked the passion among traditionalists that the brand had hoped for. In response, Dodge appears to be shifting gears and reconsidering its approach.

title: Kia Keeps On Fitting Telluride and Sorento with Wrong Spare Tires
description: The Kia Telluride and Sorento are two of the brand’s biggest hits in the US market. Year-to-date, the Telluride has moved 101,069 units while the Sorento has recorded 80,710 units, making them key drivers of Kia’s success in the SUV segment, right next to the hot-selling Sportage. But among those ...
titleSummary: Kia's Spare Tire Mix-Up Continues to Haunt Telluride and Sorento Owners
descriptionSummary: Kia's two top-performing models, the Telluride and Sorento, have dominated US sales this year, with over 181,000 combined units sold. They're major contributors to Kia's growth in the highly competitive SUV market.

title: Over 400,000 Honda Civics At Risk of Wheels Falling Off
description: American Honda is issuing a recall for the Civic, specifically models made from 2016 to 2021. The recall is to "inspect a limited number of accessory wheels," totaling 3,276 units, leading to a total vehicle recall affected tally of approximately 406,000. In a statement advisory, the Japanese ...
titleSummary: "Hundreds of Thousands of Honda Civic Owners Face Risk of Wheel Failure"
descriptionSummary: Honda is issuing a voluntary recall for certain Civic models produced between 2016 and 2021, affecting around 406,000 vehicles. The action stems from concerns over accessory wheels on about 3,276 units.

title: Japan's Auto Giants Are Ditching China — and Betting Big Somewhere Unexpected
description: Toyota, Honda, and Suzuki are transforming their manufacturing footprint with over $11 billion in new investments, and the destination has caught many by surprise. These Japanese automotive giants are rapidly building production capacity in India, marking one of the most significant strategic ...
titleSummary: "Asia's Automotive Powerhouses Pivot East, Placing Bets on a New Front Runner"
descriptionSummary: Japanese automakers Toyota, Honda, and Suzuki are dramatically shifting their global manufacturing presence with unprecedented investments exceeding $11 billion, largely targeting a previously unexpected hub: India's burgeoning market.

title: 2026 Toyota bZ Lease Deals Available for November, And They're Worth A Look
description: The EV crossover formerly known as the bZ4X, Toyota finally simplified its name to bZ for the 2026 model year. Mind you, it's still called bZ4X in most parts of the world, but we're happy the old tongue-twister of a name has been replaced with a more straightforward one for the US market, ...
titleSummary: "New Electric Toyotas Hit the Market with Attractive Leasing Options This Fall"
descriptionSummary: For the 2026 model year, Toyota is simplifying its electric crossover's name to just "bZ" stateside. Elsewhere, it retains the bZ4X moniker, but we welcome the shift to a more concise label in the US.

title: The New Land Cruiser Just Went Full G-Wagon — Thanks to Liberty Walk
description: SEMA is not new to witnessing over-the-top builds, but this time, Liberty Walk and AlphaRex have turned up the ante with their latest take on the Land Cruiser 250. The widebody exercise adds flair and muscle to the rather industrial-looking LC250. It’s strictly a body kit; no mods have been done to ...
titleSummary: "Liberty Walk's Radical Makeover Transforms Toyota Land Cruiser into a German-Inspired Beast"
descriptionSummary: At SEMA, Liberty Walk and AlphaRex unveiled an unapologetically bold makeover for the Land Cruiser 250, injecting sleek style and aggressive presence into its rugged base design through a widebody conversion that's all about aesthetics.

title: Kia Dishes Out Hot 2025 Niro EV Lease Deals For November
description: The 2025 Kia Niro EV doesn’t rely on gimmicks or marketing flash; it simply works. Beneath its clean, crossover silhouette lies a 201-horsepower electric motor paired with a 64.8 kWh battery, offering brisk acceleration and a smooth, silent ride. With a 253-mile range, it’s not about chasing ...
titleSummary: "Kia Cooks Up Sizzling 2025 Niro EV Leases for a Limited Time Only"
descriptionSummary: The Kia Niro EV is a testament to understated excellence, delivering on its promises without fanfare. Its sleek design conceals a potent electric heart: a 201-horsepower motor paired with a robust 64.8 kWh battery, providing swift acceleration and an incredibly quiet ride.

title: Jaguar Was Closer to Reviving the XJ Than Anyone Realized
description: The year was 2019, and Jaguar announced that it was discontinuing the XJ. It marked the end of over 50 years as the British automaker's flagship sedan with no successor in place. The XJ came into the world in 1968, serving as a replacement for both Mark X and S-Type. The first generation lasted an ...
titleSummary: "XJ's Second Chance: Jaguar's Near-Miss at Resurrecting a Beloved Luxury Icon"
descriptionSummary: In 2019, Jaguar bid farewell to its iconic XJ model after a 50-year reign as its flagship sedan. Launched in 1968, it had been the brand's crowning jewel since replacing the Mark X and S-Type models.

title: Koenigsegg’s New Hypercar Just Broke the Laguna Seca Record — While Under a Noise Limit
description: The Koenigsegg Sadair's Spear turned heads the moment it debuted earlier this year. Its name carries a personal touch: Jesko von Koenigsegg, Christian's father, was a jockey, and his favorite racehorse, Sadair's Spear, ran its final race in 1976. The Swedish hypercar is regarded as the ultimate ...
titleSummary: Swedish Speedster Smashes Laguna Seca Mark with Painless Performance
descriptionSummary: The Koenigsegg Jesko pays homage to a family legacy with its unique moniker. Named after Christian von Koenigsegg's father, a former jockey, it honors his beloved thoroughbred, Sadair's Spear, which retired in 1976.

title: This Luxury SUV Lets You Take a Hot Shower Wherever You Like
description: The very definition of luxury is also evolving, like the rest of the automotive industry. From the ideals of soft leather, plush materials, and stately rides, we now live in a world where "gimmickry" and technology define how luxurious your car is. Enter IM Motors (joint venture with SAIC, Alibaba, ...
titleSummary: "Mobile Oasis Unleashes Luxury in the Great Outdoors with Self-Sufficient Showering Capability"
descriptionSummary: As the automotive landscape shifts, so too does the notion of luxury. Gone are the days of merely opulent materials; today's premium vehicles are defined by cutting-edge tech and innovative features that elevate the driving experience. Meet IM Motors, a game-changer on China's automotive scene.

title: BMW Teams Up With Samsung to Speed Up Solid-State EV Batteries
description: Battery tech is evolving at such a pace that it’s difficult to keep up with what’s happening across the industry. On a global level, several OEMs have committed to commercialising solid-state batteries by the end of the decade. Toyota plans to launch its first solid-state battery-powered EV by ...
titleSummary: "BMW and Samsung Partner to Supercharge Electric Vehicle Battery Tech"
descriptionSummary: The world of battery technology is advancing rapidly, leaving many innovations in its wake. Solid-state batteries are on the cusp of mainstream adoption, with several major manufacturers pledging to bring them to market by 2030.

title: A Road-Legal Ferrari 599XX for Half the Price — And It Comes With a Manual
description: If you want something between the Ferrari 599 GTB Fiorano and the track-only 599XX and 599XX Evo, Maranello did produce the 599 GTO. The trouble is, the GTO and the XX cars were only available to Ferrari's closest clienti, and the XX variants were restricted to the track. Moreover, none of them ...
titleSummary: "Affordable Supercar Steals Spotlight with Rare Manual Transmission Option Available"
descriptionSummary: Ferrari filled a gap in its lineup with the 599 GTO, but this high-performance model was exclusive to the brand's most loyal clients and track-only variants like the 599XX and Evo remained strictly off-limits to public roads.

title: Porsche’s ‘Tunnel Mode’ Is Proof They Understand Driving Joy Better Than Anyone
description: We know how much Porsche focuses on its engineering, however, a recently revealed patent underscores that they’re just as invested in your experience. The patent in question, filed with the World Intellectual Property Organization (WIPO) late last year and published a few days ago, details a ...
titleSummary: Porsche Revs Up the Fun Factor with 'Tunnel Vision' Driving Experience
descriptionSummary: Porsche's commitment to innovative design is well-documented, but a new patent filing reveals an equally strong emphasis on crafting a premium driving experience that prioritizes user interaction.

title: BMW Drops Enticing 2026 X1 Lease Deal For November
description: In the United States, the BMW X1 flies a bit under the radar, simply because this market has a preference for larger luxury crossovers like the X3 and X5. But the current X1 generation is a much better vehicle than its predecessor. It’s spacious for a subcompact model, handles confidently, and is ...
titleSummary: "BMW Unveils Limited-Time Incentive for Affordable 2026 X1 Leasing"
descriptionSummary: While often overshadowed by bigger siblings in the US market, the BMW X1 shines with improved performance, generous interior space, and agile handling that belies its compact size, making it a worthy contender in its class.

title: All Kia EVs Just Got More Affordable with $10,000 Discounts
description: Just as September saw the $7,500 EV tax credit get axed, carmakers are jumping on the discount bandwagon to ring up sales. The latest entrant is Kia, offering a $10,000 customer cash discount across the company’s entire EV lineup. This comes after Kia slashed $8,500 off the 2025 Niro EV and $9,000 ...
titleSummary: "Kia Electrifies Savings: Brand Slashes Prices on All EV Models by $10,000"
descriptionSummary: As prices surge ahead of an impending tax credit cutback, automakers are rolling out deep discounts to keep electric vehicles moving. Kia is leading the charge with a one-time $10,000 cash incentive on all its EV models.

title: Honda Just Shut Down Dreams of a Prelude Type R
description: After months of rumors of a Type R-powered Prelude started swirling around, Honda finally has a semi-official answer. Unfortunately, it's not the one some folks wanted, much like the odds of the coupe ever getting a manual transmission option. Hint: it's zero. Don't get your hopes up with a ...

descriptionSummary: Rumors have long swirled about a Type R-powered Prelude, but Honda's official response is underwhelming. A highly anticipated upgrade remains elusive, and an even more coveted feature – a manual transmission option for the coupe – appears to be a lost cause.

title: Gordon Murray's $20M McLaren F1-Inspired Hypercar Goes to Auction at the Las Vegas Grand Prix
description: Gordon Murray shocked the Monterey Car Week crowd this year when his newly formed Special Vehicles division unveiled the S1 LM, a five-unit tribute to the 1995 Le Mans-winning McLaren F1 GTR. Disappointingly for those with exceptionally deep pockets, the press release that accompanied the reveal ...

descriptionSummary: Gordon Murray's Special Vehicles division electrified Monterey Car Week this year with the unveiling of the S1 LM, a limited-edition tribute to the 1995 Le Mans-winning McLaren F1 GTR. The exclusive run has left many enthusiasts green with envy.

title: First Toyota Land Cruiser FJ Buyers Will Have a Hard Time
description: By now, everyone is aware that Toyota’s beloved FJ nameplate has officially returned. The new Land Cruiser FJ, shown publicly for the first time at the 2025 Japan Mobility Show, was easily one of the event’s most crowded displays. Automotive journalists from other countries (myself included) ...

descriptionSummary: The eagerly anticipated return of Toyota's iconic FJ nameplate is now a reality. At this year's Japan Mobility Show, the newly unveiled Land Cruiser FJ stole the spotlight, drawing massive crowds and generating buzz among international automotive media.

title: Buick’s New Elite Minivan Makes Pacifica and Sienna Look Outdated
description: Minivans are few and far between in America today. The Toyota Sienna, Honda Odyssey, Kia Carnival, and Chrysler Pacifica are the typical flag bearers of what was once the family car of choice. However, with the popularity of crossovers and SUVs, the minivans have become a niche market – though a ...
titleSummary: "Buick's Bold Entrance: Redefining Family Haulers with Its Sleek New Luxury Van"
descriptionSummary: In today's automotive landscape, family-friendly minivans have largely fallen out of favor, relegated to a specialized niche as crossovers and SUVs dominate the market. The Toyota Sienna, Honda Odyssey, Kia Carnival, and Chrysler Pacifica hold on as stalwarts.

title: Hollywood’s Coolest Movie Cars Are Hitting the Auction Block
description: As a movie-loving car enthusiast with a Letterboxd account, some of my favorite movies happen to be those with an iconic car in them. The appearance of a particular vehicle can be as impactful as a specific actor's performance; this is why a 1967 Mustang named Eleanor is as heavily credited for its ...
titleSummary: "Iconic Wheels of Cinema History Set to Roll into Auction Action"
descriptionSummary: Car enthusiasts often find themselves captivated by films that feature exceptional vehicles, and I'm no exception. Iconic cars can be just as memorable as their stars, making movies like Gone in Sixty Seconds a true delight for fans of both cinema and automotive design.

title: Volkswagen Has Sweet Lease Deal for 2026 Atlas This November
description: Need a three-row European crossover but unwilling to pay premium prices? It seems that the Volkswagen Atlas is the only one that fits the bill. Launched in 2017 for the 2018 model year, the Atlas serves as the spiritual successor of the Touareg. Also known as the Terramont in other parts of the ...
titleSummary: "Volkswagen Offers Hot November Leasing Deal on 2026 Atlas Models"
descriptionSummary: Looking for a practical three-row European-style crossover without the hefty price tag? The Volkswagen Atlas is a prime contender, offering a premium-like experience at a more affordable price point since its 2017 debut.

title: Are Automated Tire Inflators Any Good?

titleSummary: "Dodge Demon Rarity Hits Auction Block: A Piece of Kevin Hart's Exclusive Legacy"
descriptionSummary: A singular treasure in the world of high-performance vehicles is set to appear at Mecum Kissimmee 2026: a one-of-a-kind 2023 Dodge Challenger SRT Demon 170 finished in a stunning PY5 Cream Sickle hue. It crosses the block on January 17.

title: New Audi RS6 Avant Is Taking Shape — And It’s Keeping a Gas Engine
description: The last time we covered spy shots of an Audi RS6 Avant, we saw an all-electric prototype with split headlights. descriptionSummary: Audi's upcoming RS6 Avant had previously been spotted in all-electric guise, featuring striking split headlights. Although that model appears to have been axed, sources indicate a combustion-powered RS6 is still on track, with fresh spy photos revealing its more conventional design cues.
